reviewText: Excellent video!!!!! The way that they use for rea;ization was amazing and all music and production under the king of music production.
What can I say everthing Bolton is just wonderful. I will probably buy another one of these VHS tapes because the one that I have I played it too much. This is the best of Michael Bolton.
This is Michael Bolton at his very best.  I've watched this video 20 times and it never gets old.  A must see!!! A+++!
